title: Smart Factory Tycoon
description:
Smart Factory Tycoon is a tycoon management game about running your dream factory with robots. Design your dream factory, plan all steps of production, research new technologies and become a tycoon Purchase new machinery and unlock advanced machines to produce every type of products in the market
Purchase new robots with varying colors and watch them coming to your factory by different transportation options: balloon, mine cart, boat, parachute, PWC or bus Use the skill points to level up your robots (Movement speed, processing speed, charge capacity, oil capacity) Purchase chargers, super chargers, wireless chargers, and lubricators for your robots rooms Kirby and the Forgotten Land
Upgrade your machines, solar panels, wind turbines, chargers and lubricators for faster production and increased efficiency Purchase high quality raw material to produce healthy and durable products Analyze the market to be aware of trending products Check the general market categories (Basic-Medium-Master) and Special Orders Increase your health, durability and sustainability levels to be eligible for some products in the market
Purchase wind turbines and solar panels to reduce electricity costs and increase your sustainability Plant trees in your gardens to be a sustainable factory Earn more money and XP to take the first place in the leaderboard Do the math and be aware of your expenses

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon R7-250X
